titles.title: A resolution recognizing the 63rd anniversary of India's independence, expressing appreciation to Americans of Indian descent for their contributions to society, and expressing support and optimism for the strategic partnership and friendship between the United States and India in the future.

A resolution recognizing the 63rd anniversary of India's independence, expressing appreciation to Americans of Indian descent for their contributions to society, and expressing support and optimism for the strategic partnership and friendship between the United States and India in the future.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment and with a preamble by Unanimous Consent.

term.name: Sovereignty, recognition, national governance and status

bill.summary:
(This measure has not been amended since it was introduced. The summary of that version is repeated here.)
Recognizes the 63rd anniversary of India's independence.
Celebrates the contributions of Americans of Indian descent to U.S. society.
Supports the advancement of the U.S.-India strategic partnership.
